It retrieves and processes billing adjustment data from various tables related to electric, gas, and manual billing adjustments. The procedure logs its execution for auditing purposes and formats the billing period for display. It then constructs a comprehensive dataset of adjustments, including revised billed amounts, arrears, and other financial metrics, and outputs this data in a structured format.
The procedure is complex due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple joins and subqueries across several tables.
It uses Common Table Expressions (CTEs) to manage complex data transformations.
It handles different types of billing adjustments (electric, gas, manual) with distinct logic for each.
It includes auditing and logging mechanisms.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_AgencyLevelAdjustmentsByBillingPeriod]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@BillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName					= @spname,
		@StoredProcName				= @spname,
		@RequestedBy				= @EmailAddress,
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod	= NULL,
		@prmBillingPeriod			= NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies				= @AgencyCodeOEC,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s		= NULL,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod	= @BillingPeriod,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod		= NULL

	-- format the billing period 
	DECLARE @BillingPeriodIssued AS VARCHAR(25);
	SELECT  @BillingPeriodIssued = DATENAME(MM, dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(@BillingPeriod + '01')) + ' ' +  DATENAME(YY, dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(@BillingPeriod + '01'));
	
	DECLARE @AgencyAccounts TABLE (UniqueSeqID INT NULL, AccountSeqid INT NULL);

	-- save list to a temp table to make the joins easy 
	INSERT @AgencyAccounts (UniqueSeqID, AccountSeqid)
	SELECT PAM.UniqueAccountSeqid, PAM.AccountSeqid
	FROM (SELECT A.AccountSeqid FROM Billing.Account AS A
			 INNER JOIN Billing.UniqueAccountMapping AS UAM ON UAM.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
			 INNER JOIN  Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress) AS Div ON Div.AgencyDivisionSeqID = A.AgencyAccount
		WHERE UAM.isCurrentAccount = 'Y') AS L
	INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS aMap ON  aMap.AccountSeqid = L.AccountSeqid
	INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS PAM ON PAM.UniqueAccountSeqid = aMap.UniqueAccountSeqid

	-- construct all the adjustements
	;WITH CTE_ALLAdjustements AS (
		--******************************** NYPA block ***************************************************************************************
		-- current period
		SELECT * FROM
			(SELECT AA.UniqueSeqID,
				ABAE.TotalReBilledAmount + ABAE.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + ABAE.RevisedReactivePowerDollars + ABAE.CommodityAllocationCharge + ABAE.DeliveryAllocationCharge AS RevisedBilledAmount,
				PaidAdjustmentAmount AS PaidAdjustmentAmount,
				ManualPaymentOverrideAmount AS ManualPaymentOverrideAmount,
				0 AS Arrears,
				0 AS MiscCharges, -- TOBE REVISED
				AB.TotalAmountDue
			FROM @AgencyAccounts AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric AS ABAE ON ABAE.AdjustedAccount = AA.AccountSeqid
				LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = ABAE.AdjustedAccountBill
			WHERE ABAE.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision = @BillingPeriod) AS CurrentRecords
			INNER JOIN (SELECT
					AA.UniqueSeqId AS AccountUniqueSeqid,
					MIN(ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision) AS FirstRevisedBillingPeriod,
					SUM(ABAE.TotalCanceledAmount) AS CancelledCharges,
					SUM(ABAE.TotalReBilledAmount + ABAE.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + ABAE.RevisedReactivePowerDollars + ABAE.CommodityAllocationCharge + ABAE.DeliveryAllocationCharge) AS AdjustedPeriodsCharges
				FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
					INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric ABAE ON ABAE.AdjustedAccount = AA.AccountSeqid
				WHERE ABAE.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision <> ABAE.BillingPeriod
				GROUP BY AA.UniqueSeqId) AS Adjustments
			ON Adjustments.AccountUniqueSeqid = CurrentRecords.UniqueSeqID
		UNION ALL
		--******************************** CONed Gas block ***************************************************************************************
		-- current period
		SELECT * FROM
			(SELECT AA.UniqueSeqID,
				ABAG.RevisedBilledAmount + ISNULL(ABAG.DiscountedAmount, 0) as RevisedBilledAmount,
				AB.PaidAdjustmentAmount AS PaidAdjustmentAmount,
				ManualPaymentOverrideAmount AS ManualPaymentOverrideAmount,
				ABAG.BalanceDollars AS Arrears,
				ABAG.CreditDollars + ABAG.DiscountedAmount AS MiscCharges,
				AB.TotalAmountDue
			FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS ABAG ON ABAG.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = ABAG.AccountBillingSeqid
			WHERE ABAG.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision = @BillingPeriod) AS CurrentRecords
			INNER JOIN (SELECT AA.UniqueSeqId AS AccountUniqueSeqid,
					MIN(ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision) AS FirstRevisedBillingPeriod,
					SUM(ABAG.CanceledBilledAmount) AS CancelledCharges,
					SUM(ABAG.RevisedBilledAmount + ISNULL(ABAG.DiscountedAmount, 0)) AS AdjustedPeriodsCharges		
				FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
					INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS ABAG ON ABAG.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				WHERE ABAG.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision <> ABAG.BillingPeriod
				GROUP BY AA.UniqueSeqId) AS Adjustments
			ON Adjustments.AccountUniqueSeqid = CurrentRecords.UniqueSeqID
		UNION ALL
		--******************************** National Grid Gas block ***************************************************************************************
		-- current period
		SELECT * FROM
			(SELECT AA.UniqueSeqID, 
				ABACG.RevisedBilledAmount as RevisedBilledAmount,
				AB.PaidAdjustmentAmount AS PaidAdjustmentAmount , 
				ManualPaymentOverrideAmount AS ManualPaymentOverrideAmount ,
				ISNULL( ABACG.AccountArrears, 0) AS Arrears, 
				ISNULL(ABACG.MiscellaneousChargeAmount, 0) + ISNULL(ABACG.MiscellaneousCreditAmount, 0) AS MiscCharges,
				AB.TotalAmountDue
			FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas ABACG ON ABACG.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = ABACG.AccountBillingSeqid
			WHERE ABACG.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision = @BillingPeriod) AS CurrentRecords
			INNER JOIN (SELECT AA.UniqueSeqId AS AccountUniqueSeqid,
					MIN(ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision) FirstRevisedBillingPeriod,
					SUM(ABACG.CancelBilledAmount) CancelledCharges,
					SUM(ABACG.RevisedBilledAmount) AdjustedPeriodsCharges			
				FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas ABACG ON ABACG.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				WHERE ABACG.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision <> ABACG.BillingPeriod
				GROUP BY AA.UniqueSeqId) AS Adjustments
			ON Adjustments.AccountUniqueSeqid = CurrentRecords.UniqueSeqID
		UNION ALL
		--******************************** manual billing block ***************************************************************************************
		-- current period
		SELECT * FROM 
			(SELECT 
				AA.UniqueSeqID, 
				ABAPB.RevisedBilledAmount AS RevisedBilledAmount,
				AB.PaidAdjustmentAmount AS PaidAdjustmentAmount , 
				AB.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount AS ManualPaymentOverrideAmount ,
				ABAPB.PreviousAccountBalance AS Arrears, 
				ABAPB.LatePaymentAmount AS MiscCharges,
				AB.TotalAmountDue
			FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill ABAPB ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = ABAPB.AccountBillingSeqid
			WHERE ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = @BillingPeriod) AS CurrentRecords
			INNER JOIN (SELECT AA.UniqueSeqId AS AccountUniqueSeqid,
					MIN(ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision) FirstRevisedBillingPeriod,
					SUM(ABAPB.CanceledBilledAmount) CancelledCharges,
					SUM(ABAPB.RevisedBilledAmount) AdjustedPeriodsCharges			
				FROM @AgencyAccounts AS AA
				INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill ABAPB ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = AA.AccountSeqid
				WHERE ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision <> ABAPB.BillingPeriod
				GROUP BY AA.UniqueSeqId) AS Adjustments
			ON Adjustments.AccountUniqueSeqid = CurrentRecords.UniqueSeqID)

	SELECT UC.ShortDesc AS Utility,
		AD.AgencyName AS Agency,
		AD.AgencyCodeOEC AS AgencyCode,
		F.FacilityName AS Facility,
		F.OecFacilityNumber AS OECID,
		F.Address1 AS FacilityAddress,
		A.CurrentAccountNumber AS AccountNumber, 
		EDT.EnergyType,
		CTE.FirstRevisedBillingPeriod AS EarliestPeriodAdjusted,
		@BillingPeriodIssued AS BillingPeriodIssued,
		CTE.Arrears AS OutstandingPreviousBalance,
		CTE.PaidAdjustmentAmount AS NetAdjustedCharges,
		CTE.RevisedBilledAmount AS CurrentPeriodCharges,
		CTE.AdjustedPeriodsCharges,
		CTE.CancelledCharges,
		CTE.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount AS TotalPayment,
		CTE.TotalAmountDue AS UtilityTotalAmountDue,
		CTE.MiscCharges AS CurrentPeriodMiscCharges,
		A.UtilityServiceAddress,
		A.UniqueAccountSeqid AS UniqueAccountSeqId
	FROM CTE_ALLAdjustements AS CTE
		INNER JOIN Billing.UniqueAccountMapping AS UAM ON CTE.UniqueSeqId = UAM.UniqueSeqId
		INNER JOIN billing.Account AS A ON A.AccountSeqid = UAM.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS AD ON AD.AgencyDivisionSeqid = A.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS F ON F.FacilitySeqid = A.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS UC ON UC.UtilityCompanySeqid = A.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup AS IAG ON IAG.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid = A.CurrentInvoiceAccountGroup
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS EDT ON EDT.EnergyDeliveryType = A.EnergyAccountDescription
	WHERE UAM.isCurrentAccount = 'Y'
	ORDER BY AD.AgencyCodeOEC;
END;
